title: I HAD A WONDERFUL FIRST PLACEMENT GAME!!
body: MY CLIENT CRASHED BEFORE THE GAME EVEN STARTED AND WOULDNT LET ME RECONNECT, THEN I GOT PLACED IN IRON 2 EVEN THOUGH I DIDNT EVEN GET TO PLAY IN MY FIRST RANKED GAME YAY

replies.body:
Everyone starts Bottom. But you get up to 100LPs for Wins early.

Played alot the last 3 days (like 4-5 Hours a day). And climbed to Gold1, now it gets hard only got 40 LP for a Win recently.
Everyone gets placed in iron2 first. You'll get a large amount of LP in your placements after.
I was 4th and i was placed in iron 2 too
